title: The Third Testament - Julius IV (2015) (Scanlation) (phillywilly
description:
The last book of the word of god. At the heart of the medieval legends surrounding this manuscript, lies the name of a forgotten prophet: Julius of Samaria. His story was lost to the mists of time... until now.
The Messiah has come! With this rallying cry, the rebels rise up en masse against Roman occupation. This time, their war will be total and will end only in victory. But did this long-awaited saviour receive his mission from god himself, as he claims, or is he motivated by more human passions? At the other end of the world, the Roman Julius no longer has any doubts. Carrying a scroll sealed with seven seals, he sets off on the road back to Judea,certain he has received the divine revelation which will save the world, his daughter, and the last friend he has left...

enjoy
